TITLE_CONTAINER.PAGE_TITLE: PwC is looking for freelancers to join us on project work
TITLE_CONTAINER.PAGE_TITLE_TEXT: We are inviting professionals from various indrustries with an outstanding opportunity to collaborate with PwC.
TITLE_CONTAINER.PAGE_TITLE_TEXT_2: Join our freelancer community on PwC's Freelancer Marketplace and upgrade your portofolio with project work at a leading consulting company.

CONTENT_2.TITLE: Great opportunities for leading minds
CONTENT_2.TEXT_2: PwC's Freelancer Marketplace is a unique platform where independent experts can explore different opportunities to collaborate with PwC.
CONTENT_2.TEXT_1: Fill out your profile and be the first to learn about PwC's open positions on projects in your area of expertise.

ROW_1.title: PwC areas of specialization
ROW_1.text1: To understand whether our interests are aligned, please take a look at our areas of specialization below.

AREA_PADDING_3.TITLE: Assurance
AREA_PADDING_3.TEXT_1: Organisation of financial statements, and analysing and managing risk

AREA_PADDING_4.TITLE: Technology
AREA_PADDING_4.TEXT_1: Integration of technological solutions and business processes

ADVANTAGES_TITLE_CONTAINER.TITLE:
Your advantages
of working with us
ADVANTAGES_TITLE_CONTAINER.TEXT:
PwC's Freelancer Marketplace is an opportunity
to join ambitious projects of PwC
as an independent consultant and develop your professional network.

ADVANTAGES_PADDING_1.TEXT:
Opportunity to work
on ambitious projects
of top companies
and achieve success
together with recognised
business leaders.

ADVANTAGES_PADDING_2.TEXT:
Getting cooperation
offers in line with your
experience and interests,
without significant efforts
on your part.

ADVANTAGES_PADDING_3.TEXT:
Developing a professional
network and generating
a remarkable portfolio
for career development
as an independent
consultant.

ROW_1.TITLE:
How to use
the platform
ROW_1.TEXT: Join PwC freelancers community now and receive interesting cooperation offer tomorrow.

ROW_1.SUBTITLE: Tell us about yourself
ROW_1.TEXT: Upload details about your skills and competencies. When we have open positions that are compatibile with your background, your profile will be considered among the first candidates.

ROW_2.SUBTITLE: Review our proposals
ROW_2.TEXT: Receive updates on open positions, select the most suitable options and negotiate with us. We are interested in engaging people with relevant expertise.

ROW_3.SUBTITLE: Start working
ROW_3.TEXT: After signing your contract, join a PwC team and work on unique projects, solve important challenges and share your experience with leading companies.

ROW_1.TITLE:
Open
positions
ROW_1.TEXT:
Are you looking for a new project?
Here are the opportunities
that we are ready to offer right now.

CAROUSEL_ITEM_1.TITLE: Finance Consulting
CAROUSEL_ITEM_1.SUBTITLE: Advisory
CAROUSEL_ITEM_1.TEXT: Experience in developing internal polices for IFRS, financial and management reporting.

CAROUSEL_ITEM_2.TITLE: Finance Consulting
CAROUSEL_ITEM_2.SUBTITLE: Advisory
CAROUSEL_ITEM_2.ROLE: Consultant on optimising financial business processes
CAROUSEL_ITEM_2.TEXT: Experience working in financial departments, consulting and in establishing SSCs.

CAROUSEL_ITEM_3.TITLE: Technology (SAP)
CAROUSEL_ITEM_3.SUBTITLE: Advisory
CAROUSEL_ITEM_3.TEXT: Experience in implementing different modules for SAP programming solutions. Consultants wanted for junior roles and team leaders.

CAROUSEL_ITEM_4.TITLE: Technology (ABAP)
CAROUSEL_ITEM_4.SUBTITLE: Advisory
CAROUSEL_ITEM_4.TEXT: Participation in the designing of programming applications in SAP ERP, SAP CRM, SAP PPM and others.

CAROUSEL_ITEM_5.TITLE: General Strategy & Operations
CAROUSEL_ITEM_5.SUBTITLE: Advisory
CAROUSEL_ITEM_5.TEXT: Professionals wanted with wide experience in management consulting for the Telecom, Utilities, Education and Entertainment industry.

CAROUSEL_ITEM_6.TITLE: General Strategy & Operations
CAROUSEL_ITEM_6.SUBTITLE: Advisory
CAROUSEL_ITEM_6.TEXT: Experience in modelling in Excel and in designing econometric models for the Telecom, Utilities, Education and Entertainment industry.

CAROUSEL_ITEM_7.TITLE: Actuarial Group
CAROUSEL_ITEM_7.SUBTITLE: Assurance
CAROUSEL_ITEM_7.TEXT: Experience in working with risk business processes in insurance and financial companies.

CAROUSEL_ITEM_8.TITLE: Regulatory Group
CAROUSEL_ITEM_8.SUBTITLE: Assurance
CAROUSEL_ITEM_8.TEXT: Specialist wanted with experience in developing RAS methodology in insurance and financial companies.
